issue_desc: Solves issue # 42 Publishing warning message by Intelligent controller is implemented . Also , the user component is subscribed to the warning message topic . At the moment only reaction by the user when receiving a warning is a log output . The code changes are not properly tested and might contain bugs .
issue_comments: Warning message if requirements can not be fulfilled
summary: Merge pull request # 43 from EVCommunities/42-warning-message-if-requirements- can not -be-fulfilled

issue_desc: The intelligent controller should send a warning message to a topic that all users are listening if the controller can determine that it can not fulfill all the requirements by the users . - [ x ] Design the contents of the warning message - [ x ] Implement the warning message - [ x ] Implement the calculation for the warning message condition ( intelligent controller ) - [ x ] Implement warning message publishing - [ x ] Implement the receiving of the warning messages ( user component ) Definition of Done : - Intelligent controller publishes a warning message if requirements can not be fulfilled - Users can receive the possible warning message
issue_comments: Warning message if requirements can not be fulfilled

issue_desc: Updated and unified the Dockerfile and manifest files in order to support using the GitHub container registry to store the Docker images for the components . - Added GitHub actions to build and push the Docker images to GitHub registry for all 3 components whenever the code in the main branch is updated
